mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(id, email, pw, name, birth, gender, height, weight, wbti_code) VALUES ( #{id}, #{email}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{height}, #{weight}, null )
mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.email, u.name, u.birth, u.gender, u.height, u.weight, w.wbti_code AS wbtiCode, p.score AS petScore FROM user u LEFT JOIN wbti w ON u.id = w.user_id LEFT JOIN pet p ON u.id = p.user_id WHERE u.id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET email = #{dto.email}, name = #{dto.name}, birth = #{dto.birth}, gender = #{dto.gender}, height = #{dto.height}, weight = #{dto.weight} WHERE id = #{userId}
